metadata.title: CVE-2020-18185 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: class.plx.admin.php in PluXml 5.7 allows attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code by modify the configuration file in a linux environment.

notes.note: leosilva> deferred as 2021-10-19 there is no fix yet.

criterions.comment: pluxml package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-10-19').
